name: Pictionary-Minimal
description:
This is a Pictionary clone that was made over two days, revised in the second day based off of comments received during the presentation after the first day. Points are scored based on how fast teams guess.

Features include:

  • Choose number of rounds to play
  • Choose amount of time available to draw
  • Custom team colors
  • Custom drawing color (at game setup only)
  • Points awarded based on time taken

This Unity game was designed to be used on a Touch-Screen laptop. For usage, the laptop would have to share its screen to a TV and to be passed around among the players.

This game does not include cards/topics used for drawing. 

Made using Unity version 2019.2.2f1
